scene_target: Kaelen survives the first skirmish with the Void-touched shadow-forms.
goal: Defend the shard from the emerging shadow-forms.
conflict: The shadow-forms are drawn to the shard's light, and Kaelen's oath-mark is reacting violently to their presence, hindering his defense.
end_condition: Kaelen is left wounded but alive as the shadow-forms dissipate into the glass.

recent_facts: Kaelen defended the shard against shadow-forms that emerged from the crater's edge.
The shadow-forms were dissipated by a violent burst of energy from Kaelen's oath-mark.
The remnants of the shadow-forms have been absorbed into the sky-glass of the crater, staining it black.
Kaelen has sustained serious physical injuries, including a scorched chest and a deep shoulder laceration.
The oath-mark has shifted from bruised purple to a deep, light-eating black.
